name: Humanizing Me
description:
Downloadable version available below!

Humanizing Me is a short adventure game that happens behind the walls of a regular house. You are a Robot, but not any robot - you’re a robot trying to adapt to human life in order to live among us.

And to begin your day as a human, you will need to complete the morning ritual humans perform before starting their days: shower, breakfast, and brushing your teeth.

But how can a robot, unable to perform vital functions (or even get wet!), accomplish all these three tasks, so easy for humans like us?


Features
  • Classic style Point & Click adventure game
  • Puzzles resolution
  • Manually animated cutscenes
  • +150 text lines available in English, Spanish, and Catalan
  • Real Pixel Art in the original resolution of Sega Genesis/Megadrive
  • Integrated tutorial
